attributes.action: make it Government Policy to build a tidal barrier across the River Severn with the purpose of generating  zero carbon electricity within 10 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The construction of a tidal barrier across the River Severn has several benefits. 
Firstly, it will generate totally clean and dependable energy based on proven technology.
Secondly, it will be a world-scale engineering project creating real jobs and skills in the UK.
Thirdly, it will give to the UK  technological knowledge and expertise which could be replicated in the UK and abroad to contribute to the production of really clean energy.
Fourthly, it would make a major contribution to the security of energy supply in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
